card.name: Joeseph the White
card.text: Trample, Flanking Joeseph the White can fully crew any vehicle. If a vehicle crewed by Joeseph the White attacks, exile it. Return that vehicle tapped and attacking at the beginning of the combat step of a player chosen at random. Partner with Truck (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Truck into their hand from their library, then shuffle it.)

card.name: Truck
card.text: Trample, First Strike When Truck enters the battlefield, add 1 Gas counter for each time it has been cast from the Command Zone this game. Whenever Truck attacks, if there are 1 or more Gas counters on it, exile it. Return it to the battlefield under your control tapped and attacking at the beginning of your next combat. Crew 1 Partner with Joeseph the White

card.name: Bimere the Relic
card.text: Annihilator 1 Whenever Bimere the Relic is dealt damage, deal that much damage to each opponent. {w}{u}{b}{r}{g}: Choose 1 - Gain +10/+10 until end of turn. - Gain Annihilator 4 until end of turn. - Target creature gains haste, indestructible and deathtouch until end of turn. {w}{w}{u}{u}{b}{b}{r}{r}{g}{g}: Search your library for a Titan, reveal it and add it to your hand.

card.name: Wild Magic
card.text: Shroud Whenever a player plays a nonland permanent, that player sacrifices a nonland permanent at random. That player then draws cards until they find a permanent, puts it on the battlefield, then shuffles all cards drawn this way back into their library.

card.name: Yumeia, Dungeon Adept
card.text: Eminence-Raid Party. (A party consists of an Artificer, Barbarian, Druid, and Warlock in addition to previous creature types.) When you cast your first party creature each turn, you may draw a card. This spell costs {1} less for each creature in your party. Sidequest?-{3}:Target creature goes on an Adventure. Yumeia, Dungeon Adept has all abilities of party creatures in exile.
